.. Porcupy documentation master file

Porcupy: Crested Porcupine Optimizer
===================================

.. image:: /resources/img/logo.png
   :alt: Porcupy Logo
   :align: right
   :width: 200

A Python implementation of the Crested Porcupine Optimizer (CPO) algorithm, featuring GPU acceleration and comprehensive visualization tools.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Getting Started
